body.name: Office Chair Hero Fix Attaches Clamps to Large Cylinder Piston Stops Your Chairs Sinking When Computer Hydraulic Lift Has No Gas Stop Replacement
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 18 mins
features: DURABLE MATERIAL - Our chair stop office chair gas lift cylinder replacement is made from high strength plastic from an injection mold and not 3D printed from a printer

SIMPLE INSTALLATION - No need to look for that hydrolic chair cylinder replacement when you can install the Office Chair Hero in 2 easy steps. Measure how many and which pieces you need and simply snap The Hero on your computer chair cylinder
FITS MOST CYLINDERS - Office Chair Hero fit's most chair cylinders on the market, with an exception of a few and come with 4 pieces for a total of different 15 size combinations
MAXIMUM STRENGTH - Looking for a replacement office chair cylinder? No worries, the Office Chair Hero has you covered and can hold up to 600 pounds! The Office Chair Hero is your chair buddy.
COST-EFFECTIVE - Forget the costly office chair cylinder replacement or replacing the office chair piston, simply add our industrial-strength plastic fixes, and the problem is solved

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Loaded with great features! Includes 4 different pieces! Our set includes 4 different pieces, which will give you a total of 15 different size combinations. Super thick material! The Office Chair Hero is made of super durable and thick material that measures 3/16" thick which will last a very long time. Easy installation! Our cylinder spacers can be installed in literally just seconds. Place around the cylinder and snap shut. Universal fit! Our chair fix is slightly wider on the inside which will fit most all office and gaming chairs.
Installation is a Breeze! Installation is quick and does not require tools
Holds up to 600 pounds! Strong, durable plastic will hold the weight you want and will not break.
Save Money! Don't go through the hassle of purchasing and installing a new piston on your office chair. The Salbree Office Chair Hero is the simple and quick fix that you are looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I needed. Easy to install, works like a charm. Keeps the chair exactly where I want it with assorted sizes to make the adjustment you want. Keeps the chair in place, no more up and down. Saves on buying another part and makes the cair last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works! And so simple!
reviews.reviewText: Saved me from buying a new office chair and keeps my chair at the correct height. Simple to install and seems very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper than buying a new chair and they work!
reviews.reviewText: Seems chair gas lifts aren't made like they used to be - but these little beauties are heroes to the rescue! Work perfectly. With the 4 sizes in box, you can mix and match to get the height you want. I've had these for about a year and still holding strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Installed these about a month ago, and they are working fine. I did not find them to be as easy to snap together as they led me to believe. I'm a big guy, but after the first one I used channel locks for the rest. They made installation super easy, and I highly recommend this method.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It stops the chair from sinking
reviews.reviewText: I bought my new office chair to replace an old one that was falling apart, but also to hopefully correct the tendency of the old one to sink over time. Sadly, this new chair quickly starting showing the same behavior - slowly sinking as I sat in it, requiring me to constantly raise it back up again. I checked for a solution online, and, short of replacing the cylinder, the most common solution was to use a piece of PVC pipe fitted around the cylinder. The trouble with that was, with my chair at least, it would have required disassembling and reassembling chair to get the PVC in place.The Hero Fix was the perfect solution. It's inexpensive and provides set of clamps that easily install around the cylinder without needing to remove it from the chair and can be adjusted to several different heights by mixing the different sized clamps. One deficiency is that you can't combine them in any way to make 4", but I found that 4 1/4" works fine for my chair. They feel sturdy and click into place fairly easily. Once you install them the chair height will be fixed to at least the height of the clamps unless you remove and reinstall the clamps in a difference combination, but I always want my chair at its maximum height, so they are a perfect solution for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and work well
reviews.reviewText: The riser on my office chair was starting to fail, and I was considering purchasing a new chair. When I saw these heavy duty “spacers“, I thought I would give them a try. The package contains several spacers, all of different lengths which I was able to combine to brace the central rod on the chair. Basically, they fill in the gap to keep the riser extended. They clamp around the smaller section of rod, so that the rising mechanism cannot collapse.My chair is in excellent condition aside from the problem with the riser, so I am very happy to not have to buy a new chair for a while longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chair saver Must have
reviews.reviewText: I was actually about to throw out my chair. It’s only been six months and my chair dropped and wouldn’t adjust back up. I had no idea how to fix it so I went online for solutions. I found these and I’m glad I did. They are easy to install. Just clasp them together from largest to smallest to the height that you need and it’s fixed. I’m a big guy, 250 plus pounds and the hold my weight well. No cracking sounds. This was a cheap fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New life to old chair
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these because the office chair I bought ad the beginning of the pandemic was doing the slow slide down. Found these recommended in a Facebook group and figured I had nothing to lose. No more chair slide! They were easy to put on and much cheaper than a new chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic product for Chair always sliding down
reviews.reviewText: Thank you so much for your product and truly one of the best things I bought this year. Saved me hundreds instead of buying a new chair.
La use en una haworth zody y todo bien.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Good - but you might need a wrench
reviews.reviewText: I chose this because it would not be unattractive when installed - with obvious screws or clips etc. I was concerned when I put the modules on my chair as I couldn't manage to close them. I presumed that the stem of my chair was too large. However, I found that by using a pipe wrench I was able to close them. Once closed, I am very happy with the result.
簡単に取り付けられて、外れないのでいいです。

reviews.reviewTitle: I am amazed by this simple solution
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the kit yesterday, it arrived promptly today. So easy to install, it took less than 3 minutes et voilà! Problem fixed, not more sinking. Money well spent.
